about_the_game:
Welcome to the prison walls, where you will have to become a hero and fight for your freedom!

FREE DUROV is an exciting 3D first-person game where you play as Durov, trying to escape from captivity by completing various tasks and solving puzzles.



What to Expect in the Demo: Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of a solitary cell, where every detail tells its own story. You're surrounded by familiar objects — a bathtub filled with ice, dumbbells, and posters, all contributing to a constant sense of pressure and tension.

Memes and visual references to real-world events will enhance the rebellious spirit of the game, allowing you to view the situation with a touch of humor.

Key Features:
- A visually rich cell environment with memes and subtle references
- Unique objects that create a strong sense of isolation and tension

The game is being developed in support of our idol. We value freedom of speech.

name: FREE DUROV - DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970

short_description: FREE DUROV – experience all the hardships of prison life and try to escape using your intellect and agility. Can you overcome all the traps and keep the encryption key safe?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
